generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings extending into the distance, which is characteristic of a road.
- sidewalk: There are sidewalks on both sides of the road, clearly delineated from the road by curbs and pedestrian areas.
- building: Multiple buildings are visible along the street, including commercial and residential structures.
- fence: A metal fence runs along the left side of the road, separating it from a green area.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including traffic light poles and utility poles.
- traffic light: Traffic lights are visible at the intersection ahead.
- traffic sign: Traffic signs are visible on poles along the road.
- vegetation: Trees and other vegetation are visible in the background and along the sides of the road.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing overcast.
- person: A person is standing on the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
- car: Several cars are visible parked or driving on the road.
- bicycle: Bicycles are parked on the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
